apis.name: Get All/My Aircraft
apis.description: Retrieves all aircraft that I have access to. Example questions: What aircraft do I have access to? What aircraft are in my fleet?

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort (asc or desc).

regulation_authority.description: Filter by regulation authority (e.g., FAA, EASA).

response.description: A list of aircraft.

apis.name: Get Aircraft by tail number
apis.description: Retrieves details of a specific aircraft by its tail number.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.  Examples of this may include: N12345, N1KE, G-GALX

response.description: A single aircraft.

apis.name: Get aircraft utilization/times history
apis.description: Retrieves the utilization history of a specific aircraft, including flight hours, engine cycles, and landings.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.  Examples of this may include: N12345, N1KE, G-GALX

response.description: A list of aircraft utilizations/times.

apis.name: Get upcoming maintenance for a specific aircraft
apis.description: Retrieves the scheduled maintenance tasks for a specific aircraft, with pagination and sorting options.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.  Examples of this may include: N12345, N1KE, G-GALX

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort (asc or desc).

response.description: A list of scheduled maintenance.

apis.name: Get maintenance requests for an aircraft
apis.description: Retrieves all maintenance requests associated with a specific aircraft.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.  Examples of this may include: N12345, N1KE, G-GALX

response.description: A list of maintenance requests.

apis.name: Get the maintenance due for a specific aircraft
apis.description: Retrieves a list of maintenance tasks and when they are due for a specific aircraft by tail number.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.

response.description: A list of maintenance items and when they are due.

apis.name: Check aircraft airworthiness
apis.description: Determines whether an aircraft is airworthy based on overdue maintenance.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.

response.description: Airworthiness status of the aircraft.

apis.name: Get inventory or equipment installed on aircraft
apis.description: Retrieve the inventory or equipment installed on a specific aircraft.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort (asc or desc).

response.description: A list of inventory or equipment.

apis.name: Get work history
apis.description: Retrieves the maintenance work history for a specific aircraft.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.

response.description: A list of work performed entries.

apis.name: Update aircraft usage and times
apis.description: Updates the aircraft usage metrics including flight hours, engine cycles, and landings. This endpoint allows tracking usage for both the aircraft and its components. Example questions: How do I update flight hours for N12345? I need to log new times for G-GALX.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.

flight_date.description: Flight date to log for the aircraft's usage (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

usage_metrics.description: Array of usage metrics to record for the aircraft and its components. Each metric includes inventory_id, metric_type, value, and optional penalties.

response.description: Confirmation of updated aircraft usage with details of updated inventory items and created metrics.

apis.name: Record work performed
apis.description: Records maintenance work performed on an aircraft.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft.

scheduled_maintenance_id.description: The ID of the scheduled maintenance associated with the work.

work_description.description: Description of the maintenance work performed.

performed_by.description: The name of the individual or team performing the work.

flight_hours_at_service.description: Flight hours of the aircraft at the time of service.

engine_cycles_at_service.description: Engine cycles of the aircraft at the time of service.

landing_at_service.description: Number of landings recorded at the time of service.

response.description: Form to add work performed entries.

apis.name: Get bases of operation
apis.description: Retrieves the active bases of operation.

response.description: A list of bases of operation.

apis.name: Get maintenance due for all aircraft or when no aircraft is specified
apis.description: Retrieves a list of overdue maintenance tasks when no specific aircraft is specified.

response.description: A list of maintenance items and when they are due.

apis.name: Get upcoming maintenance for all aircraft or when no aircraft is specified
apis.description: Retrieves a list of scheduled maintenance tasks across all aircraft user has access to. Used when a specific tail number is not specified.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort (asc or desc).

response.description: A list of maintenance items.

apis.name: Get upcoming unscheduled maintenance (discrepancies, squawks) for all aircraft or when no aircraft is specified
apis.description: Retrieves a list of unscheduled maintenance tasks (discrepancies, squawks) across all aircraft user has access to. Used when a specific tail number is not specified.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort (asc or desc).

response.description: A list of maintenance items.

apis.name: Get product catalog to purchase from
apis.description: Retrieves a paginated list of products available for purchase, filtered by customer ID.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Defaults to 10.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by. Defaults to 'part_number'.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort ('asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to 'desc'.

response.description: A list of products to purchase.

apis.name: Get list of purchase orders
apis.description: Retrieves a paginated list of purchase orders associated with the customer.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Defaults to 10.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by. Defaults to 'part_number'.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort ('asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to 'desc'.

response.description: A list of purchase orders.

apis.name: Get purchase order detail
apis.description: Retrieves the details of a specific purchase order, including line items, supplier information, and base of operation.

order_number.description: The unique order number of the purchase order to retrieve.

response.description: A single purchase order with line items.

apis.name: Get list of suppliers
apis.description: Retrieves a paginated list of suppliers associated with the customer.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Defaults to 10.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by. Defaults to 'name'.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort ('asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to 'desc'.

response.description: A list of suppliers.

apis.name: Get list of inventory/part locations
apis.description: Retrieves a paginated list of inventory locations associated with the customer.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Defaults to 10.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by. Defaults to 'name'.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort ('asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to 'desc'.

response.description: A list of inventory/part locations.

apis.name: Get inventory location/part and stock levels
apis.description: Retrieves a paginated list of inventory/part location and stock levels associated with the location.

code.description: The barcode of the inventory location to retrieve.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

limit.description: The number of items to retrieve per page. Defaults to 10.

sortBy.description: The field to sort the results by. Defaults to 'name'.

sortOrder.description: The direction of the sort ('asc' or 'desc'). Defaults to 'desc'.

response.description: A list of inventory/part locations and inventory stock.

apis.name: Report Aircraft Discrepancy (Unscheduled Maintenance/Squawk)
apis.description: Reports a new aircraft discrepancy, unscheduled maintenance issue, or squawk for an aircraft by tail number.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft. Examples of this may include: N12345, N1KE, G-GALX

reported_by.description: ID of the person reporting the issue.

reported_date.description: Date and time the issue was reported.

reported_location.description: Location where the issue was reported.

severity.description: Severity of the issue (LOW, MODERATE, HIGH, GROUNDED).

safety_impact.description: Indicates if the issue impacts safety.

repeat_issue.description: Indicates if the issue has been reported before.

flight_phase.description: Phase of flight when the issue occurred (PREFLIGHT, TAXI, TAKEOFF, CRUISE, LANDING).

aircraft_time.description: Aircraft total hours at the time of reporting.

engine_cycles.description: Engine cycles at the time of reporting.

landings.description: Number of landings at the time of reporting.

response.description: The newly created unscheduled maintenance record.

apis.name: Get Open Aircraft Discrepancies (Unscheduled Maintenance/Squawks)
apis.description: Retrieves all open discrepancies, unscheduled maintenance issues, or squawks for a specific aircraft by tail number.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft. Examples of this may include: N12345, N1KE, G-GALX

response.description: A list of open discrepancies or unscheduled maintenance records.

apis.name: Get Deferred Aircraft Discrepancies (MEL/CDL Deferrals)
apis.description: Retrieves all deferred discrepancies, MEL/CDL deferrals, or postponed maintenance issues for an aircraft by tail number.

tail_number.description: The unique tail number of the aircraft. Examples of this may include: N12345, N1KE, G-GALX

response.description: A list of deferred discrepancies or maintenance deferrals.

apis.name: Assign Aircraft Discrepancy (Unscheduled Maintenance/Squawk)
apis.description: Assigns an aircraft discrepancy, unscheduled maintenance issue, or squawk to a maintenance technician or team for resolution.

id.description: The ID of the discrepancy or unscheduled maintenance issue to assign.

assigned_to.description: The name of the maintenance technician or team assigned to resolve the issue.

response.description: The updated discrepancy or maintenance record with assigned details.

apis.name: Defer Aircraft Discrepancy (MEL/CDL Deferral)
apis.description: Defers an aircraft discrepancy under Minimum Equipment List (MEL) or Configuration Deviation List (CDL) guidelines.

id.description: The ID of the maintenance issue or discrepancy to defer.

mel_reference_number.description: The reference number for the MEL authorization.

deferral_approved_by.description: The name of the authorized person approving the deferral.

mel_expiration_date.description: The expiration date of the MEL deferral.

response.description: The newly created MEL/CDL deferral record.

apis.name: Resolve Aircraft Discrepancy (Unscheduled Maintenance/Squawk)
apis.description: Marks an aircraft discrepancy, unscheduled maintenance issue, or squawk as resolved and updates its status.

id.description: The ID of the maintenance issue or discrepancy to resolve.

resolved_by.description: The ID of the maintenance technician who resolved the issue.

response.description: The updated discrepancy or maintenance record with resolution details.
